body.p:
The Management Team page can be used to define the site management team (users with the Owner, Admin, or Moderator role). To reach this page, click the Management Team link in the left menu bar in the interface for a particular site configuration. The current team is listed with their avatar, name, and email address. To the right of each team member, there is a drop-down menu where you can change their roles to one of the following:
Moderator - This type of user has rights to moderate comment posts (edit, approve, reject, or delete).
Admin - This type of user has rights to moderate comment posts and to edit site settings and versions.The site Owner is automatically assigned when the site configuration is created. However, site ownership can be transferred from the General Settings page.
To remove a user, click the button to the right of the drop-down menu. When a user is removed from the management team, they are assigned a role of Member.
To add a new user, enter their email address in the Email field at the top of the page, assign a role with the drop-down menu, and click the Add button.
